column4: Hi all. I'm running Ubuntu 9.10 in a VM, but I have to actually log into Gnome before the screen resizes itself to match my native resolution. How can I configure gdm (and the kernel, at boot) to use the same display settings as my gnome session?
try adding   vga=778   to the boot options for the kernel
slart: What about GDM? Surely by then, the drivers are loaded
OK, I'll give that a shot
